sense.def:
A dream
je vrsta dogodkov, o katerih sanjamo.

seg.quote: In his dream he was sitting in a theatre watching a play.

sense.def:
Če človek takrat, ko spi,
dreams
, v mislih vidi podobe.

seg.quote: I dreamt that I was beaten up by Ernest Hemingway.

sense.def:
A dream
je tudi nekaj, o čemer pogosto razmišljamo, ker želimo, da bi se zgodilo.

seg.quote: His dream of being champion had come true.

sense.def:
To dream
pomeni razmišljati o nekih okoliščinah ali dogodku, za katerega si močno želimo, da bi se zgodil.

seg.quote: She dreamed of having a car.

sense.def:
Če človek reče:
I would not dream of doing something
, hoče poudariti, da nečesa ne bi storil.

cit.quote: še na misel mi ne pride, da bi to storil

seg.quote: A lot of the boys would never dream of going away for residential courses.

sense.def:
To dream up a plan
pomeni izmisliti si načrt.

seg.quote: He would never dream up a desperate scheme like that on his own.
